result.title: Loews Corporation Comments on Delaware Supreme Court's Ruling
result.text: NEW YORK , Dec. 11, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Loews Corporation (NYSE: L) announced today that the Delaware Supreme Court issued a ruling in the litigation relating to its 2018 acquisition of the minority limited partner interests in its Boardwalk Pipelines subsidiary. The Supreme Court found that there was a breach in connection with the underlying partnership agreement and remanded the issue of whether Loews was liable for tortious interferenceback to the Delaware Court of Chancery.

result.title: LOEWS CORPORATION ANNOUNCES QUARTERLY DIVIDEND ON COMMON STOCK
result.text: NEW YORK , Nov. 11, 2025 /PRNewswire/ --Loews Corporation (NYSE: L) announced today the declaration of the Company's quarterly dividend of $0.0625 per share of Common Stock, payable December 9, 2025 to shareholders of record as of the close of business on November 26, 2025. Loews Corporation is a diversified company with businesses in the insurance, energy, hospitality, and packaging industries.

result.title: Spire Wealth Management Sells 3,615 Shares of Loews Corporation $L
result.text: Spire Wealth Management reduced its position in shares of Loews Corporation (NYSE: L) by 77.9% during the undefined quarter, according to the company in its most recent Form 13F filing with the Securities and Exchange Commission. The fund owned 1,026 shares of the insurance provider's stock after selling 3,615 shares during the period.

result.title: Loews Corporation Elects Dino Robusto to Its Board of Directors
result.text: NEW YORK , Nov. 3, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Loews Corporation (NYSE: L) announced today that Dino Robusto has been elected a director of Loews, effective January 1, 2026. Mr. Robusto was the Chief Executive Officer and Chairman of the Board of Loews's subsidiary, CNA Financial Corporation (NYSE: CNA), from 2016 until 2024, and has served as Executive Chairman of CNA during 2025.

result.title: LOEWS CORPORATION REPORTS NET INCOME OF $504 MILLION FOR THE THIRD QUARTER OF 2025
result.text: NEW YORK , Nov. 3, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Loews Corporation (NYSE: L) today released its third quarter 2025 financial results. Third Quarter 2025 highlights: Loews Corporation reported net income of $504 million, or $2.43 per share, in the third quarter of 2025, compared to $401 million, or $1.82 per share, in the third quarter of 2024.

result.title: Loews Corporation to Release Third Quarter 2025 Results on November 3, 2025
result.text: NEW YORK , Oct.14, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Loews Corporation(NYSE: L) will report third quarter 2025 financial results onMonday, November 3, 2025. On that date the Company will also post earnings remarks on its website.
